name: Baba Ghanoj
shortdesc: A traditional Levantine dish of mashed cooked eggplant mixed with tahini, olive oil, and various seasonings.

name: Beetroot Mutabal
shortdesc: A vibrant and flavorful dip made with roasted beetroots blended with tahini, garlic, and lemon juice.

name: Grape Leaves
shortdesc: Deliciously stuffed grape leaves with a savory filling of rice, pine nuts, and aromatic herbs.

name: Hummus Beirut
shortdesc: A creamy and smooth chickpea dip, seasoned with a special blend of Lebanese spices.

name: Hummus with Meat
shortdesc: Classic hummus topped with tender chunks of seasoned meat, pine nuts, and a drizzle of olive oil.

name: Hummus with Red Pepper
shortdesc: A delicious twist on traditional hummus, enhanced with roasted red peppers and a hint of chili.

name: Hummus
shortdesc: The classic Middle Eastern chickpea dip, blended to perfection with tahini, lemon juice, and garlic.

name: Kebah Neah
shortdesc: A delightful dish of finely ground meat mixed with bulgur and spices, served raw.

name: Labneh
shortdesc: A thick and tangy strained yogurt, served with a sprinkle of mint and a drizzle of olive oil.

name: Mtabal
shortdesc: A smoky eggplant dip blended with tahini, garlic, and lemon juice, garnished with pomegranate seeds.

name: Avocado Salad
shortdesc: A fresh mix of ripe avocados, crisp lettuce, and juicy tomatoes, perfect for a healthy appetizer.

name: Chef Special Salad
shortdesc: A unique blend of fresh vegetables and special dressing, handpicked by our chef.

name: Crab Salad
shortdesc: A delightful salad with fresh crab meat, mixed greens, and a tangy dressing.

name: Fattoush Salad
shortdesc: A traditional Levantine salad made from toasted pieces of pita bread combined with mixed greens and other vegetables.

name: Greek Salad
shortdesc: A classic salad with feta cheese, olives, and fresh vegetables, tossed in an olive oil dressing.

name: Owl Salad
shortdesc: A delightful salad with a wise choice of greens and toppings, a hoot for your taste buds.

name: Pomelo Salad
shortdesc: A citrusy salad with juicy pomelo segments, mixed greens, and a sweet and tangy dressing.

name: Rocca Tabbouleh
shortdesc: A refreshing twist on the traditional tabbouleh with rocca leaves, pomegranate seeds, and bulgur.

name: Tabbouleh Salad
shortdesc: A classic Middle Eastern salad with finely chopped parsley, mint, tomato, bulgur, and onion, dressed with olive oil and lemon juice.

name: Araes
shortdesc: Delicious pita bread stuffed with a mixture of spiced meat, grilled to perfection.

name: Cheese Roll
shortdesc: Crispy rolls filled with melted cheese and herbs, a perfect start to your meal.

name: Chicken Liver with Oil
shortdesc: Succulent chicken liver sautéed with a blend of spices and finished with a drizzle of quality olive oil.

name: Chicken Liver with Pomegranate
shortdesc: Tender chicken livers cooked with pomegranate molasses for a sweet and tangy flavor.

name: Chicken Wings
shortdesc: Juicy chicken wings seasoned with our special blend of spices and served with a side of sauce.

name: Dynamite Shrimp
shortdesc: Crispy shrimp tossed in a creamy, spicy sauce that will set your taste buds alight.

name: Freka with Cream
shortdesc: Creamy freka topped with a blend of spices and herbs, a smooth and comforting dish.

name: Friad Kibbeh
shortdesc: Deliciously spiced and fried kibbeh balls, a crispy outside with a savory meaty inside.

name: Grilled Halloumi
shortdesc: Slices of firm and salty halloumi cheese, grilled to golden perfection.

name: Grilled Kibbeh
shortdesc: A delightful dish of kibbeh, grilled to bring out its rich flavors and served with sides.

name: Potatoes with Cheese
shortdesc: Roasted potatoes covered in a rich and creamy cheese sauce, sprinkled with fresh herbs.

name: Sausage
shortdesc: Flavorful sausages grilled to perfection and served with a tangy dipping sauce.

shortdesc: Crispy fried potatoes tossed in a spicy seasoning blend, perfect for those who like it hot.
